articles.title: SA's My Octopus Teacher takes home the Oscar: 'A huge privilege to represent this place I love' - News24
articles.description: South Africa’s first ever Netflix original documentary, My Octopus Teacher, has won an Oscar.
articles.content:
• South Africa's first ever Netflix original documentary, My Octopus Teacher, has won an Oscar.
  • The film beat four other remarkable documentaries to take home the coveted statuette.

articles.title: Zikalala calls for thorough investigation into Myeni's death - eNCA
articles.description: Lindani Myeni, a former South African rugby player was shot and killed by police in Hawaii last week.
articles.content:
JOHANNESBURG - KZN Premier Sihle Zikalala has joined calls for a thorough investigation into the death of Lindani Myeni.

articles.title: T. rexes liked to walk as slowly as humans do, a leisurely 5kph, a new study says - Business Insider South Africa
articles.description: Experts already knew T. rex was slow, with a max speed between 10 and 25 mph. But a new study suggests these predators preferred to walk even slower.
articles.content:
For all the awe Tyrannosaurus rex inspires, the "king of the dinosaurs" wasn't very speedy.  
Paleontologists already knew this predator was slow: It could only reach a maximum speed between 10 and … [+5468 chars]

articles.title: The scientist behind Pfizer's Covid-19 vaccine says people will likely need annual shots - Business Insider South Africa
articles.description: BioNTech's chief medical officer said the COVID-19 vaccine would be similar to the annual flu shot as immunity wanes over time.
